column5: I know someone that already has about 10 days in the boat, been eating salmon already.
My folks lake (4ml) is half clear now.  Anything South of it looks to be open.  Tight lines all!!!
I've been in the boat 3 times already.  Sadly less time to fish than I'd like at the moment.
Boat has been wet a bunch this year.   Lake O, Georgian Bay, etc.   Love the spring!
I’ve been out for bass already !
This last Saturday.  Wife doesn’t play around when it comes to masks lol
Spring if home I'd be all over those lakes open already north of Lady O.  And probably on the big pond after lakers too. Can't wait for May.
My lake is going to be a few weeks yet
